entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Trump always wants the USA to be #1.  Is he proud that the USA has the highest number of COVID-19 cases and deaths due to his pathetic approach to containing and managing the virus?  @SpeakerPelosi
